title: Volunteer Information
business_narrative: This scenario shows how IBDM handles volunteered information gracefully. When users provide extra details before being asked, the system recognizes and integrates that information, skipping unnecessary questions. This demonstrates intelligent context awareness and efficiency.

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: I need to draft an NDA

turns.speaker: system
turns.utterance: What are the parties to the NDA?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Acme Corp and Smith Inc, effective January 1, 2025
turns.business_explanation: User provides parties AND effective date (volunteer info)

turns.speaker: system
turns.utterance: What is the duration of confidentiality obligations?
turns.business_explanation: System SKIPS date question (already answered) - asks next
turns.larsson_rule: Rule 5.1 - Raise issue from private.issues to shared.qud

turns.speaker: system
turns.utterance:
Perfect! I have all the details. Here's your NDA:

╔══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════╗
║          MUTUAL NON-DISCLOSURE AGREEMENT                     ║
╚══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════╝

Parties:     Acme Corp and Smith Inc
Effective:   January 1, 2025
Term:        3 years
Type:        Mutual (both parties bound)

✓ Document ready for execution
✓ Efficiently gathered via volunteer information

metrics.system_transparency: High - User always knows what's being asked and why
